parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the full backup file. You can call the ListUserBackupFiles operation to query the information about all full backup files in a region.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to query the resource group ID.
